title: [EBAY] Not sure - doesn't feel quite right?

posts.content:
Gut feeling on this tells me it could be a scammer - happy to be proved wrong. Anyone recognise this bus?


http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VW-RHD-Split- ... 259c491e74
Don't know anything about that bus and maybe prices are different on your side of the water but that seems awfully cheap for what it is to me. Of course, I could be totally wrong here.

Send them an email....Try to buy it...
".....selling on behalf of a relative..."

"We will be sad to see this go....."
No location address
Selling on eBay for a relative ..... because Seller is an experienced eBay er. ..he has zero feedback...

Somehow he managed to get an external email "to contact me " on in an advert. ...thought that was against eBay rules. ...
I smell fii iii ish. .

Ask for a scan of the V5C. ...that should be fun...
Feed the details in here...

https://www.vehicleenquiry.service.gov.uk/

says it is green.
Untaxed due October 2014.

You're right, feels like a scam. Little things -

Email contact rather than through ebay and unknown email provider (not gmail, BT etc).

Will be sad to see it go / not using it ...but it's selling for a relative not him.

Price is probably about £4-6k under for an older resto 59 RHD bus but with all the shiny bits in the UK camper market.

Zero ebay feedback - actually a good scammer would buy and sell a few things between ghost accounts first, so not even a good scammer.

As said above, check details out, arrange for a viewing, wait for him to squirm...

Sent them an email through Ebay - it's given a warning that the user is registered through a different Ebay site and the email message will appear in what ever language I type it in?

Ipswich........??? Long live the Peoples Republic Of Ipswich.....

Is Ipswich a tax haven?

....yes...Sorry but there a lot of "foreign" gang masters and workers in East Anglia...
May be the winter job...
Someone's pride and joy...
Bargain at that price...
Wait and see...
The spare wheel bulkhead panel looks strange.

Yes it looks like a fibre glass panel custom made by the interior fitting company..
Does anyone recognise the interior?
I have had no reply to anything...
If genuine would have sold at that price!

It is a scam. They don't want viewers. They won't supply their phone number. They want to cancel the Ebay advert when they've found a buyer and set up a (fake) Ebay private buy it now item. It won't actually be on EBay so you'll only be able to pay via the link on their Email. You won't see the VW or your money ever again.

Avoid !! eBay have been alerted.

SCAM ALERT
FROM AMY WAYNE (AKA THE SCAMMER)


Hi,

The original listing (where you contacted me from) was placed by a relative but it will be soon removed if we come to a deal.
The van is in perfect condition with no damages or any faults and no rust. All necessary documents available. The engine size is 1600cc and the year is 1959.

My husband passed away 1 month ago and now i am in Denmark, visiting my parents during this difficult time.

The price is: £14.000, more than fair i could say.
I want to close this deal through eBay. It will be delivered from the UK by my relative and I’ll pay the costs. It will arrive at your address in 2-3 days, then you’ll have 5 days for inspection. Delivery process will start in the same day when we have the transaction confirmed through eBay. I will not get your payment until you’ll receive, inspect and agree with the van. This is their policy regarding this type of transactions.

If you are serious about buying it, i can set up a private listing on eBay with a Buy It Now option so we can go through the Buyer Protection Program.

Looking forward to hear from you.
Many thanks!
PS BUY IT NOW SO I CAN SKIM YOUR MONEY......

Yeah - thought it felt wrong from the start. I am in the middle of a chain of emails "negotiating"a deal with Amy. Nice girl, slightly broken English and very good at giving the answer she wants, and not to the questions you have asked. If this scam falls through for her, maybe she will have a future in politics!

I can see how they could catch some people out.

Bus looks nice though - anyone recognise it?
I got the exact same Email from 'Amy'

Yes please...
Where do I travel to in Ipswich...I must be only a mile or so away....
I can view today....
Let me know...

Please do not get this wrong but 2 days ago another person went to see/collect the van but had £3000 less than we agreed. Therefore i can't ask my relative to meet again unless i have a confirmation that the buyer is serious and legit. As i said the delivery will be arranged at my costs.
I am serious about this and have discussed with my relative... He is willing to arrange delivery for me, all i need is a serious buyer. If you are that person i can place the listing on eBay with a buy it now option and we can move forward. I will not get paid until you’ll receive, inspect and agree with the van.

AS YOU SAY CAPABLE GIRL.....RECKONS SHE CAN TAKE SEVERAL MEN AT THE SAME TIME
